comment.author: 42402526@N00
comment._content: Yes: The name of the director of the Metropolitan Opera ist Heinrich Conried, not "Conreid" as written in the title and the description of the foto. As Conried died on 27 Apr 1909, the foto can be dated correctly with 1909. Source: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heinrich_Conried

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: the funeral does look like it's in a theater with a set as the backdrop. but these pictures are supposed to start in 1910. Yet his funeral was at the Metropolitan Opera House on May 13, 1909. An account of the funeral: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9806E5DE1E31E733A...

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks all! We'll look int it.

comment.author: 8388998@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called New York City Undertakers & Funeral Homes, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
